chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall (tr : list (name * (input + list output))) (h : option Client_index) (c : Client_index) (i : Msg), i <> Unlock -> trace_mutual_exclusion' h tr -> trace_mutual_exclusion' h (tr ++ [(Client c, inl i)])

Premises:
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Inductive Msg : Set := Lock : Msg | Unlock : Msg | Locked : Msg
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
Inductive Name : Type := Client : Client_index -> Name | Server : Name
Client_index = fin num_Clients : Type
Inductive sum (A B : Type) : Type := inl : A -> A + B | inr : B -> A + B Arguments sum (_ _)%type_scope Arguments inl {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments inr {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
trace_mutual_exclusion = fun trace : list (name * (input + list output)) => trace_mutual_exclusion' None trace : list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop Arguments trace_mutual_exclusion _%list_scope
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
trace_mutex'_locked_extend : forall (tr : list (name * (input + list output))) (h : option Client_index) (n : Client_index), trace_mutual_exclusion' h tr -> last_holder' h tr = None -> trace_mutual_exclusion' h (tr ++ [(Client n, inr [Locked])])
trace_mutex'_no_out_extend : forall (tr : list (name * (input + list output))) (n : name) (h : option Client_index), trace_mutual_exclusion' h tr -> trace_mutual_exclusion' h (tr ++ [(n, inr [])])
last_holder'_locked_some_eq : forall (tr : list (Name * (input + list Msg))) (h : option Client_index) (c n : Client_index), last_holder' h (tr ++ [(Client c, inr [Locked])]) = Some n -> c = n
last_holder'_no_out_extend : forall (tr : list (name * (input + list output))) (h : option Client_index) (c : name) (n : Client_index), last_holder' h tr = Some n -> last_holder' h (tr ++ [(c, inr [])]) = Some n
last_holder'_no_out_inv : forall (tr : list (name * (input + list output))) (h : option Client_index) (c : name) (n : Client_index), last_holder' h (tr ++ [(c, inr [])]) = Some n -> last_holder' h tr = Some n
last_holder'_server_extend : forall (tr : list (Name * (input + list output))) (h : option Client_index) (i : input), last_holder' h (tr ++ [(Server, inl i)]) = last_holder' h tr
last_holder'_locked_extend : forall (tr : list (Name * (input + list Msg))) (h : option Client_index) (n : Client_index), last_holder' h (tr ++ [(Client n, inr [Locked])]) = Some n
trace_mutual_exclusion' = fix trace_mutual_exclusion' (holder : option Client_index) (trace : list (name * (input + list output))) {struct trace} : Prop := match trace with | [] => True | (Client n0, inl Unlock) :: tr' => match holder with | Some m => if fin_eq_dec num_Clients n0 m then trace_mutual_exclusion' None tr' else trace_mutual_exclusion' holder tr' | None => trace_mutual_exclusion' holder tr' end | (Client n0, inl Lock) :: tr' | (Client n0, inl Locked) :: tr' | (Client n0, inr []) :: tr' => trace_mutual_exclusion' holder tr' | (Client n0, inr [Locked]) :: tr' => match holder with | Some _ => False | None => trace_mutual_exclusion' (Some n0) tr' end | (Client n0, inr (Lock :: _)) :: _ | (Client n0, inr (Unlock :: _)) :: _ | (Client n0...

last_holder' = fix last_holder' (holder : option Client_index) (trace : list (name * (input + list output))) {struct trace} : option Client_index := match trace with | [] => holder | (Client n0, inl Unlock) :: tr => match holder with | Some m => if fin_eq_dec num_Clients n0 m then last_holder' None tr else last_holder' holder tr | None => last_holder' holder tr end | (Client n0, inr [Locked]) :: tr => last_holder' (Some n0) tr | (Client n0, inl Lock) :: tr | (Client n0, inl Locked) :: tr | (Client n0, inr []) :: tr | (Client n0, inr (Lock :: _)) :: tr | (Client n0, inr (Unlock :: _)) :: tr | (Client n0, inr (Locked :: _ :: _)) :: tr => last_holder' holder tr | (Server, _) :: tr => last_holder' holder tr end : option Client_index ->...-> option Client_index Arguments last_holder' _ _%list_scope
valid_locked = fun (q : list Client_index) (h : bool) (c : Client_index) (p : packet) => pDst p = Client c /\ (exists t : list Client_index, q = c :: t) /\ h = false : list Client_index -> bool -> Client_index -> packet -> Prop Arguments valid_locked _%list_scope _%bool_scope
valid_unlock = fun (q : list Client_index) (h : bool) (c : Client_index) (p : packet) => pSrc p = Client c /\ (exists t : list Client_index, q = c :: t) /\ h = false : list Client_index -> bool -> Client_index -> packet -> Prop Arguments valid_unlock _%list_scope _%bool_scope

step_failure_ind : forall P : list name * network -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailureParams ?P]
reachable_intro : forall (a : network) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))), step_async_star step_async_init a tr -> reachable step_async step_async_init a
locks_correct_input_handlers : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')
InputHandler_cases : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (st : Data) (u : unit) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i st = (u, out, st', ms) -> (exists c : Client_index, h = Client c /\ (i = Lock /\ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = [(Server, Lock)] \/ i = Unlock /\ out = [] /\ held st' = false /\ (held st = true /\ ms = [(Server, Unlock)] \/ st' = st /\ ms = []))) \/ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = []
locks_correct_unlock_input_handlers_old : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
locks_correct_locked_input_handlers_old : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> locks_correct_locked (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p

```coq
intros tr h c i H_neq_unlock H_trace_mut_excl.
unfold trace_mutual_exclusion' in *.
remember (tr ++ [(Client c, inl i)]) as tr'.
induction tr' as [| [n [p | ls]] tr' IHtr'].
- simpl. exact H_trace_mut_excl.
- destruct p.
  + destruct i0.
    * destruct H_trace_mut_excl.
      { rewrite Heqtr'. apply trace_mutex'_no_out_extend. assumption. }
      { destruct H as [_ [_ [_ [H _]]]]. discriminate H. }
    * destruct i0.
      { destruct ls; discriminate Heqtr'. }
      { destruct ls.
        - discriminate Heqtr'.
        - injection Heqtr' as Heq Heql.
          apply trace_mutex'_locked_extend; assumption. }
  + destruct ls; discriminate Heqtr'.
Qed.
```

original: intros tr h c i H_neq_unlock H_trace_mut_excl. unfold trace_mutual_exclusion' in *. remember (tr ++ [(Client c, inl i)]) as tr'. induction tr' as [| [n [p | ls]] tr' IHtr']. - simpl. apply H_trace_mut_excl. - destruct p. + destruct i0. * destruct H_trace_mut_excl. { rewrite Heqtr'. apply trace_mutex'_no_out_extend. auto. } { destruct H as [_ [_ [_ [H _]]]]. discriminate H. } * destruct i0. { destruct ls; discriminate Heqtr'. } { destruct ls. - discriminate Heqtr'. - injection Heqtr' as Heq Heql. apply trace_mutex'_locked_extend; auto. } + destruct ls; discriminate Heqtr'.
